Tutorial¶

This tutorial will describe walk through the steps of setting up a model with Python scripting. Scripting allows the user to create complex models with many constraints relatively easily.

  • Simple films
    • Defining a film
    • Choosing an instrument
    • Attaching data
    • Performing a fit
    • Back reflectivity
  • Tethered Polymer
    • Defining the film
    • Setting fit ranges
    • Attaching data
  • Composite sample
    • Channel measurement
  • Superlattice Models
    • Hard material structures
    • Soft material structures
    • Freeform structures
  • MLayer Models
